My Todo App

Fetching data from .NET Backend...

  • {{ item.task }} ✅ ❌
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { public todos: any[] = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit() { this.getTodos(); } getTodos() { this.http.get('weatherforecast').subscribe( (result) => { // Just testing connection first. Change 'weatherforecast' to '/api/todo' later console.log(result); }, (error) => console.error(error) ); // Once you fix the proxy, uncomment this: /* this.http.get('/api/todo').subscribe(result => { this.todos = result; }); */ } }
